items.text: full outside off, and he tries to muscle a drive through the covers. Off the bat's inside half, and the ball dribbles back to Aponso
items.shortText: Aponso to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full just outside off, and pushed past the bowler's left once again
items.shortText: Aponso to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full and wide outside leg stump. Sharp take from the keeper ensures it doesn't go down as byes
items.shortText: Malinga to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 wide

items.text: full and straight. Mehidy offers his straight bat, and drives this back past the bowler. Mid-on intercepts
items.shortText: Malinga to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.preText: KP: "Liton Das should be keeping today now that Mushfiqur has batted for so long in draining conditions."
items.text: full on middle, but this is the slower ball. Mehidy did well to keep his eyes on the ball, and then works it square to the leg side
items.shortText: Malinga to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: full on off, and he drives straight. But the bat turns in his hand, and the shot is steered to mid on
items.shortText: Malinga to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.preText: Shawkat : "Someone must have informed the bd batsman about end of summer sales at Dubai mall, hence the urgency to finish the game ASAP. "
items.text: attempted yorker on middle stump, but Mehidy does excellently to dig this away. Raises his back leg and then toe-ends the shot to the leg side
items.shortText: Malinga to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: short outside off, and he manages to muscle a pull over the fielder at midwicket. Played over the infield, and back they come for the second run
items.shortText: Malinga to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 2 runs

items.text: back of a length on leg stump, and going down the leg side once again. Tired delivery from Malinga there. Mehidy did try to pull, by the way, but he missed the shot completely
items.shortText: Malinga to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 wide

items.text: good length on middle, but Mehidy shuffles across to the off side - thereby exposing two stumps - but manages to clip this fine for a single off his pads
items.shortText: Malinga to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.preText: Twenty overs to go. Can Bangladesh double their score?
items.text: full-ish outside off, and he drills a cover drive to Thisara at deep extra cover
items.shortText: Aponso to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 2 runs

items.text: airy and loopy outside off. Mehidy drives through once again, but finds the fielder at cover
items.shortText: Aponso to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: driven inside-out to wide long off. Full on middle stump this time
items.shortText: Aponso to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: full on off, and he comes down the wicket to drive. But he effectively yorks himself, and mistimes a shot to cover
items.shortText: Aponso to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: slog-swept to cow corner! Tossed up on middle, and he swings across the line. Goes into the boundary after a couple of bounces
items.shortText: Aponso to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: full on middle, and driven straight back to the bowler. Well stopped
items.postText: Breaking news: Tamim Iqbal has been ruled out of the Asia Cup after fracturing his left wrist during Bangladesh's tournament opener against Sri Lanka in Dubai. He is likely to be out of action for at least six weeks.
items.shortText: Aponso to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: good length on middle, and worked off his hips to the gap near midwicket. Nice early call for the second run.
items.postText: Umpire Erasmus has a chat with Malinga over an attempted fake-fielding perhaps. He had slid in, but hadn't collected the ball. No penalties given though
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 2 runs

items.text: good length on middle, and defended
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: slower ball, but full on off. He carefully taps this to the leg side for a quick single
items.postText: Jayesh Asrani: "@Arun: I have seen people (even children) playing cricket here in Dubai for the whole summer when the temperatures soared to even 45+. Even our team has played non-stop round the year for around 8 years now."
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: short outside off, and he slashes hard at this! Cuts over the fielder at point for a single
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.preText: Shah Safeer: "On paper, it looked like Pakistan and India will make it to super four with ease. But It seems we are underestimating Sri Lankan team"
items.text: full just outside off, and that's been tapped into the vacant region near cover for a quick single. The fielder has a shy at the non-striker's stumps, but no direct-hit effected
items.postText: Ricky: "Bangladesh without their best batsman similar to India without Kohli makes it more fair"
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off, and he sticks his bat out to steer this fine to short third man. Thinks he's beaten the fielder, but a diving stop from near the 30-year circle saves a certain boundary
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.preText: Mehidy giving good company to Mushfiqur.
items.text: full and wide outside off, and he leans into a cover drive through the infield. Protection in the deep though
items.shortText: Aponso to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full on middle stump, and he takes a big stride forward to defend
items.shortText: Aponso to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: smacked into the wide long-on boundary! But the ball drops short of the ropes, and then slows down. Was full on middle, and he swung a wild shot over the head of midwicket
items.shortText: Aponso to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 3 runs
